Plot: The girl Mélanie Prouvost is the beloved daughter of the butchers Mrs. Prouvost and Mr. Prouvost. She is an aspirant pianist and her parents make her application to the Conservatory. During...
Title: The Page Turner
Writer: Denis Dercourt (scenario and dialogue), Jacques Sotty (collaboration)
Actors: Catherine Frot, Déborah François, Pascal Greggory, Clotilde Mollet
tomatoConsensus: Reminiscent of Hitchcock and Chabrol, The Page Turner is elegant yet suspenseful, a revenge potboiler of a high degree.
